resources.CONTENT:
neutron net-create ext-net --shared --router:external=True

neutron subnet-create ext-net --name ext-subnet --allocation-pool start=172.17.2.230,end=172.17.2.240 --disable-dhcp --gateway 172.17.2.254 172.17.2.0/24

neutron net-create net1

neutron subnet-create net1 --name subnet1 --gateway 10.0.0.1 10.0.0.0/24

neutron router-create router1

neutron router-interface-add router1 subnet1

neutron router-gateway-set router1 ext-net
